Index.title: Welcome to Next.js Lab
Index.subtitle: A modern application built with Next.js, MongoDB, and TypeScript

mongodb.title: MongoDB Integration
mongodb.description: This app uses MongoDB to handle user data with GET & POST operations.

layouts.title: Different Layouts
layouts.description: The app demonstrates different layouts for various sections like Users and About.

metadata.title: Dynamic Metadata
metadata.description: Each page has its own dynamic metadata for better SEO performance.

Index.note: This project demonstrates internationalization with English and Arabic support

About.title: About Our Project
About.description: This is a Next.js application created as part of a lab task to demonstrate various Next.js features and capabilities.

list.mongodb: MongoDB integration for user data management
list.api: Custom API routes for handling GET and POST requests
list.layouts: Different layout implementations for various sections
list.metadata: Dynamic metadata generation for each page
list.isr: Incremental Site Regeneration on users route

Footer.description: A modern web application demonstrating Next.js features

hero.title: Welcome to NextGen Hub
hero.subtitle: Your all-in-one platform for modern web development and innovation

development.title: Development Tools
development.description: Access our comprehensive suite of development tools, including code editors, debugging utilities, and real-time collaboration features. Perfect for teams and individual developers.

learning.title: Learning Resources
learning.description: Discover our extensive collection of tutorials, documentation, and interactive courses. From beginner to advanced topics, we've got everything you need to master modern web development.

community.title: Community Hub
community.description: Join our vibrant community of developers. Share your projects, get feedback, collaborate on open-source initiatives, and connect with like-minded professionals from around the world.
